Module cz.zcu.kiv.ir.silhavyj.searchengine
Package cz.zcu.kiv.ir.silhavyj.searchengine.index

Class BagOfWords

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.zcu.kiv.ir.silhavyj.searchengine.index.BagOfWords
  • public class BagOfWords
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Jakub Silhavy This class represents a bag of words. It is used to store a document, so it can be used for ranking.
